description: Quick shopping list app - create, organize, and share shopping lists. localStorage-first, no backend needed.

userStories.title: Create Shopping List
userStories.description: User can create a new shopping list with a name
acceptanceCriteria: User can enter list name and create list

userStories.title: Add Items to List
userStories.description: User can add items to a shopping list
acceptanceCriteria: User can type item name and add to list
Items appear in list with checkbox

userStories.title: Check Off Items
userStories.description: User can mark items as purchased/complete
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking checkbox marks item as done

userStories.title: Delete Items
userStories.description: User can remove items from list

userStories.title: Organize by Category
userStories.description: Items can be grouped by category (produce, dairy, etc)
acceptanceCriteria: User can assign category to item
Items grouped by category in view

userStories.title: Mobile Responsive
userStories.description: App works well on mobile devices

userStories.title: Share List
userStories.description: User can share list via link
acceptanceCriteria: Generate shareable URL with list data encoded

userStories.title: Quick Add with Auto-Complete
userStories.description: Suggest common items as user types
acceptanceCriteria: Show suggestions from common grocery items

userStories.title: Clear Completed Items
userStories.description: One-click to remove all checked items
acceptanceCriteria: Count of items to be cleared shown

codebasePatterns: Follow GifCard pattern: single public/index.html with inline JS
Use server-utils.js from lodestar/lib for server boilerplate
